description: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems
author: frack113
Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock'
SCYTHE '@scythe_io'
name: Suspicious Firewall Configuration Discovery Via Netsh.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\netsh.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"netsh.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*netsh\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*show\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*firewall\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*config\ *" OR "*state\ *" OR "*rule\ *" OR "*name\=all*")))
